MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML1 postcode area of Motherwell. It was necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 8:30pm due to safety concerns with our underground cable network located on Woodside Street and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:30pm on Saturday, 13 March 2021
